row.process:
:SET &VARA_OBJ_CONFIG# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.INCLUDE.CONFIGURATIONS" :SET &UC4RB_BUFFER_MEMORY# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "BUFFER_MEMORY") :SET &UC4RB_BATCH_SIZE# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "BATCH_SIZE")
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" SET ENV_BUFFER_MEMORY=&UC4RB_BUFFER_MEMORY# SET ENV_BATCH_SIZE=&UC4RB_BATCH_SIZE# : ELSE export ENV_BUFFER_MEMORY="&UC4RB_BUFFER_MEMORY#" export ENV_BATCH_SIZE="&UC4RB_BATCH_SIZE#" : ENDIF
